20110109190015.000|20110109190016.000|CC1|>>> THIS SUNDAY, A SHOOTING     
20110109190016.000|20110109190017.000|CC1|RAMPAGE IN ARIZONA GRIPS THE    
20110109190017.000|20110109190021.000|CC1|NATION AND STUNS CAPITOL HILL.  
20110109190021.000|20110109190026.000|CC1|CLINGING TO LIFE THIS MORNING,  
20110109190026.000|20110109190029.000|CC1|THREE-TERM ARIZONA CONGRESSWOMAN
20110109190029.000|20110109190030.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS, SHOT IN THE 
20110109190030.000|20110109190033.000|CC1|HEAD BY A GUNMAN AT A           
20110109190033.000|20110109190036.000|CC1|CONSTITUENT EVENT IN TUCSON.    
20110109190036.000|20110109190038.000|CC1|SIX ARE DEAD, INCLUDING A       
20110109190038.000|20110109190038.000|CC1|9-YEAR-OLD GIRL, A FEDERAL JUDGE
20110109190038.000|20110109190039.000|CC1|AND AN AIDE TO THE              
20110109190039.000|20110109190040.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN.                  
20110109190040.000|20110109190040.000|CC1|ANOTHER 12 WERE WOUNDED.        
20110109190040.000|20110109190041.000|CC1|THE PRESIDENT ADDRESSED THE     
20110109190041.000|20110109190041.000|CC1|NATION FROM THE WHITE HOUSE.    
20110109190041.000|20110109190045.000|CC1|>> WE ARE GOING TO GET TO THE   
20110109190045.000|20110109190045.000|CC1|BOTTOM OF THIS, AND WE'RE GOING 
20110109190045.000|20110109190049.000|CC1|TO GET THROUGH THIS.

20110109190204.000|20110109190205.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS IN       
20110109190205.000|20110109190209.000|CC1|TUCSON, ARIZONA, HAS REVERB     
20110109190209.000|20110109190211.000|CC1|RATED ALL AROUND THE COUNTRY,   
20110109190211.000|20110109190214.000|CC1|INCLUDING HERE IN WASHINGTON.   
20110109190214.000|20110109190215.000|CC1|REPEAL OF HEALTH CARE REFORM A  
20110109190215.000|20110109190216.000|CC1|SHORT TIME AGO.                 
20110109190216.000|20110109190217.000|CC1|HOUSE SPEAKER JOHN BOEHNER SPOKE
20110109190217.000|20110109190220.000|CC1|PUBLICLY.

20110109190221.000|20110109190226.000|CC1|IS AN ATTACK ON ALL WHO SERVES. 
20110109190226.000|20110109190228.000|CC1|NO ACT, NO MATTER HOW HEINOUS,  
20110109190228.000|20110109190229.000|CC1|MUST BE ALLOWED TO STOP US FROM 
20110109190229.000|20110109190234.000|CC1|OUR DUTY.

20110109190243.000|20110109190244.000|CC1|ABOUT THE HAVE IT REYOL IN OUR  
20110109190244.000|20110109190248.000|CC1|POLITICS.

20110109190250.000|20110109190254.000|CC1|>> DAVID, GOOD MORNING TO YOU.  
20110109190254.000|20110109190255.000|CC1|I SPOKE TO THE MAYOR HERE A     
20110109190255.000|20110109190256.000|CC1|WHILE AGO, AND HE TOLD ME HE HAD
20110109190256.000|20110109190259.000|CC1|BEEN TO THE HOSPITAL.           
20110109190259.000|20110109190301.000|CC1|HE HAD SPOKEN TO MARK KELLY, THE
20110109190301.000|20110109190302.000|CC1|HUSBAND OF THE CONGRESSWOMAN.   
20110109190302.000|20110109190307.000|CC1|HE SAYS HER CONDITION REMAINS   
20110109190307.000|20110109190308.000|CC1|THE SAME AS YESTERDAY.          
20110109190308.000|20110109190309.000|CC1|SHE'S IN CRITICAL CONDITION     
20110109190309.000|20110109190310.000|CC1|AFTER SUFFERING WHAT THE DOCTORS
20110109190310.000|20110109190312.000|CC1|DESCRIBE AS A WUL IT THROUGH THE
20110109190312.000|20110109190314.000|CC1|BRAIN, AT LEAST THROUGH HER     
20110109190314.000|20110109190317.000|CC1|HEAD, AND THAT SHE'S IN CRITICAL
20110109190317.000|20110109190320.000|CC1|CONDITION.                      
20110109190320.000|20110109190321.000|CC1|THEY ARE OPTIMISTIC, BUT        
20110109190321.000|20110109190322.000|CC1|CERTAINLY DON'T KNOW WHAT KIND  
20110109190322.000|20110109190322.000|CC1|OF RECOVERY SHE WILL HAVE.      
20110109190322.000|20110109190323.000|CC1|THE SUSPECT, JARED LOUGHNER IN  
20110109190323.000|20110109190323.000|CC1|CUSTODY.                        
20110109190323.000|20110109190324.000|CC1|NOT COOPERATIVE, NOT TALKING    
20110109190324.000|20110109190325.000|CC1|ABOUT A MOTIVE.                 
20110109190325.000|20110109190326.000|CC1|THE FBI, DAVID, AS YOU KNOW, IS 
20110109190326.000|20110109190326.000|CC1|INVOLVED ALONG WITH THE LOCAL   
20110109190326.000|20110109190327.000|CC1|SHERIFF HERE.                   
20110109190327.000|20110109190330.000|CC1|THEY'RE TRYING TO FIGURE OUT A  
20110109190330.000|20110109190334.000|CC1|MOTIVE BY EXPLORING LOUGHNER'S  
20110109190334.000|20110109190337.000|CC1|POSTINGS TO SOCIAL NETWORK      
20110109190337.000|20110109190339.000|CC1|SITES, YOUTUBE VIDEOS, RANTS    
20110109190339.000|20110109190341.000|CC1|THAT HE HAD POSTED.             
20110109190341.000|20110109190342.000|CC1|CLEARLY AN ANTI-GOVERNMENT VENT,
20110109190342.000|20110109190343.000|CC1|BUT NO PARTICULAR POINT OF VIEW 
20110109190343.000|20110109190344.000|CC1|THAT WAS APPARENT.              
20110109190344.000|20110109190345.000|CC1|SOME OF THIS STUFF SIMPLY DIDN'T
20110109190345.000|20110109190346.000|CC1|MAKE ANY SENSE, DAVID.          
20110109190346.000|20110109190349.000|CC1|>> I WANT TO COME BACK TO       
20110109190349.000|20110109190352.000|CC1|LOUGHNER IN JUST A SECOND.      
20110109190352.000|20110109190354.000|CC1|TELL ME MORE OF WHAT YOU'VE     
20110109190354.000|20110109190357.000|CC1|LEARNED OF THE VICTIMS THERE.   
20110109190357.000|20110109190357.000|CC1|>> I'M SORRY.                   
20110109190357.000|20110109190359.000|CC1|>> MORE ABOUT THE VICTIMS OF    
20110109190359.000|20110109190400.000|CC1|THIS RAMPAGE YESTERDAY, WHO ELSE
20110109190400.000|20110109190404.000|CC1|WAS KILLED AND SOME OF THE      
20110109190404.000|20110109190406.000|CC1|OTHERS INJURED.                 
20110109190406.000|20110109190408.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WELL, OF, THERE WAS
20110109190408.000|20110109190410.000|CC1|FEDERAL JUDGE JOHN ROLL, U.S.   
20110109190410.000|20110109190411.000|CC1|DISTRICT COURT JUDGE WHO WAS    
20110109190411.000|20110109190413.000|CC1|KILLED HERE.                    
20110109190413.000|20110109190414.000|CC1|THERE WERE THREE ELDERLY PEOPLE,
20110109190414.000|20110109190416.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS.                   
20110109190416.000|20110109190418.000|CC1|IT WAS A SMALL CROWD WHO        
20110109190418.000|20110109190419.000|CC1|ACTUALLY GATHERED FOR THIS      
20110109190419.000|20110109190421.000|CC1|EVENT.                          
20110109190421.000|20110109190422.000|CC1|ALSO A 30-YEAR-OLD AIDE OF THE  
20110109190422.000|20110109190423.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN, AMONG THOSE      
20110109190423.000|20110109190423.000|CC1|KILLED.                         
20110109190423.000|20110109190425.000|CC1|THERE WERE AT LEAST -- INCLUDING
20110109190425.000|20110109190426.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS, AT LEAST
20110109190426.000|20110109190427.000|CC1|13 PEOPLE OR PERHAPS MORE WHO   
20110109190427.000|20110109190428.000|CC1|WERE WOUNDED.                   
20110109190428.000|20110109190429.000|CC1|FIVE OF THOSE, WE'RE TOLD, ARE  
20110109190429.000|20110109190429.000|CC1|IN CRITICAL CONDITION.          
20110109190429.000|20110109190432.000|CC1|SOME WERE TREATED AND RELEASED. 
20110109190432.000|20110109190434.000|CC1|>> LET ME ASK YOU MORE ABOUT THE
20110109190434.000|20110109190438.000|CC1|SUSPECT, JARED LEE LOUGHNER.    
20110109190438.000|20110109190439.000|CC1|ONE OF THE THINGS THAT IS       
20110109190439.000|20110109190441.000|CC1|EMERGING NOW IS THAT HE WAS     
20110109190441.000|20110109190443.000|CC1|KICKED OUT OF THE COMMUNITY     
20110109190443.000|20110109190445.000|CC1|COLLEGE THERE IN PIMA COUNTY    
20110109190445.000|20110109190447.000|CC1|AND, IN FACT, THERE WAS THE     
20110109190447.000|20110109190447.000|CC1|PURCHASE OF A GUN SHORTLY AFTER 
20110109190447.000|20110109190450.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20110109190450.000|20110109190451.000|CC1|WHAT IS THE INFORMATION ABOUT   
20110109190451.000|20110109190455.000|CC1|THE KIND OF ISOLATION HE FELT,  
20110109190455.000|20110109190457.000|CC1|HOW MENTALLY DISTURBED HE WAS,  
20110109190457.000|20110109190500.000|CC1|AND HOW THAT WOULD LATER        
20110109190500.000|20110109190501.000|CC1|MANIFEST ITSELF INTO            
20110109190501.000|20110109190502.000|CC1|ANTI-GOVERNMENT RANTS OR        
20110109190502.000|20110109190503.000|CC1|ANTIAUTHORITY RANTS THAT WOULD  
20110109190503.000|20110109190508.000|CC1|GIVE US MORE OF A SENSE OF HIS  
20110109190508.000|20110109190509.000|CC1|MOTIVE?                         
20110109190509.000|20110109190509.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU KNOW, IT WAS   
20110109190509.000|20110109190512.000|CC1|INTERESTING.                    
20110109190512.000|20110109190513.000|CC1|I TALKED TO A YOUNG WOMAN WHO   
20110109190513.000|20110109190514.000|CC1|WENT TO HIGH SCHOOL AND STUDIED 
20110109190514.000|20110109190515.000|CC1|WITH HIM IN COLLEGE FOR A SHORT 
20110109190515.000|20110109190515.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110109190515.000|20110109190515.000|CC1|SHE HADN'T SEEN HIM IN THREE    
20110109190515.000|20110109190516.000|CC1|YEARS, BUT SHE DESCRIBED HIM AS 
20110109190516.000|20110109190517.000|CC1|SOMEWHAT OUTGOING, LIKEABLE.    
20110109190517.000|20110109190518.000|CC1|I SAID TO HER THAT'S NOT HOW    
20110109190518.000|20110109190518.000|CC1|OTHERS DESCRIBE HIM NOW, THEY   
20110109190518.000|20110109190521.000|CC1|DESCRIBE HIM AS A LOANER.       
20110109190521.000|20110109190522.000|CC1|AND SHE ACKNOWLEDGED THAT NEAR  
20110109190522.000|20110109190523.000|CC1|THE END OF THEIR RELATIONSHIP,  
20110109190523.000|20110109190525.000|CC1|HE WAS BECOMING A LITTLE STRANGE
20110109190525.000|20110109190528.000|CC1|IN HER WORDS, TO PAIR PHRASE HER
20110109190528.000|20110109190528.000|CC1|WORDS.                          
20110109190528.000|20110109190532.000|CC1|BUT THE WRITING SUGGESTS A MAN  
20110109190532.000|20110109190533.000|CC1|WHO HAD A -- CLEARLY ISSUES WITH
20110109190533.000|20110109190536.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT, BUT THINGS LIKE 
20110109190536.000|20110109190539.000|CC1|THERE SHOULDN'T BE POLICE       
20110109190539.000|20110109190539.000|CC1|OFFICERS.                       
20110109190539.000|20110109190542.000|CC1|THAT'S UNCONSTITUTIONAL.        
20110109190542.000|20110109190546.000|CC1|NOTHING YOU COULD ASCRIBE TO A  
20110109190546.000|20110109190547.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY RECOGNIZED         
20110109190547.000|20110109190548.000|CC1|VIEWPOINT.                      
20110109190548.000|20110109190549.000|CC1|HE WAS SUSPENDED FROM COLLEGE   
20110109190549.000|20110109190550.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF A VIDEO HE PUT       
20110109190550.000|20110109190550.000|CC1|TOGETHER.                       
20110109190550.000|20110109190551.000|CC1|COLLEGE OFFICIALS WEREN'T       
20110109190551.000|20110109190551.000|CC1|SPECIFIC ABOUT IT.              
20110109190551.000|20110109190554.000|CC1|PARENTS WERE CALLED IN.         
20110109190554.000|20110109190555.000|CC1|HE WAS SUSPENDED AND LATER IN   
20110109190555.000|20110109190555.000|CC1|THE FALL DROPPED OUT OF COLLEGE.
20110109190555.000|20110109190557.000|CC1|OF COURSE, THERE WAS A LAST     
20110109190557.000|20110109190558.000|CC1|POSTING ON ONE OF THE SITES     
20110109190558.000|20110109190605.000|CC1|SAYING SEE YA LATER.            
20110109190605.000|20110109190607.000|CC1|THAT NOW SEEMS OMINOUS.         
20110109190607.000|20110109190608.000|CC1|THAT WAS THE LAST POSTING BEFORE
20110109190608.000|20110109190610.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING RAMPAGE.           
20110109190610.000|20110109190612.000|CC1|>> ANTI-SEMITISM, "MIND COMPS BY
20110109190612.000|20110109190613.000|CC1|HITLER" WE KNOW CONGRESSWOMAN   
20110109190613.000|20110109190614.000|CC1|GIFFORDS IS JEWISH.             
20110109190614.000|20110109190618.000|CC1|IS THAT A FACTOR AT ALL THAT    
20110109190618.000|20110109190619.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS ARE LOOKING AT?   
20110109190619.000|20110109190620.000|CC1|>> I THINK THEY'RE LOOKING AT   
20110109190620.000|20110109190621.000|CC1|EVERYTHING RIGHT NOW.           
20110109190621.000|20110109190622.000|CC1|AS WE NOTED, THE SHERIFF AND FBI
20110109190622.000|20110109190625.000|CC1|INVOLVED HERE.                  
20110109190625.000|20110109190627.000|CC1|AND THEY ARE TRYING -- THEY'RE  
20110109190627.000|20110109190628.000|CC1|PIECING THROUGH ALL OF THESE    
20110109190628.000|20110109190630.000|CC1|THINGS AND TRYING TO FIND AS    
20110109190630.000|20110109190632.000|CC1|MUCH AS THEY CAN FROM THE SOCIAL
20110109190632.000|20110109190634.000|CC1|NETWORK POSTINGS, HIS WRITINGS, 
20110109190634.000|20110109190637.000|CC1|ACCESS TO WEAPONS, ALL THESE    
20110109190637.000|20110109190638.000|CC1|THINGS, TRYING TO FIGURE OUT A  
20110109190638.000|20110109190641.000|CC1|MOTIVE.                         
20110109190641.000|20110109190642.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY WHEN SOMEONE OBVIOUSLY
20110109190642.000|20110109190645.000|CC1|CHOOSES TO SHOOT A MEMBER OF    
20110109190645.000|20110109190646.000|CC1|CONGRESS, SHE WAS THE ONE THAT  
20110109190646.000|20110109190648.000|CC1|WITNESSES TELL US WAS THE FIRST 
20110109190648.000|20110109190651.000|CC1|ONE TARGETED BY HIM.            
20110109190651.000|20110109190652.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY, THEY'RE LOOKING AT   
20110109190652.000|20110109190652.000|CC1|EVERYTHING THAT MIGHT SUGGEST   
20110109190652.000|20110109190653.000|CC1|SOME KIND OF POLITICAL          
20110109190653.000|20110109190654.000|CC1|MOTIVATION.                     
20110109190654.000|20110109190654.000|CC1|>> FINALLY, LESTER, THERE IS    
20110109190654.000|20110109190655.000|CC1|ALSO ANOTHER PERSON OF INTEREST 
20110109190655.000|20110109190656.000|CC1|THAT AUTHORITIES ARE TALKING    
20110109190656.000|20110109190656.000|CC1|ABOUT.                          
20110109190656.000|20110109190657.000|CC1|AND THEY'VE PUT A PICTURE OUT   
20110109190657.000|20110109190657.000|CC1|FOR THE COMMUNITY THERE.        
20110109190657.000|20110109190658.000|CC1|WHAT MORE CAN YOU TELL US ABOUT 
20110109190658.000|20110109190702.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20110109190702.000|20110109190703.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU KNOW, THAT CAME
20110109190703.000|20110109190705.000|CC1|UP DURING A NEWS CONFERENCE BY  
20110109190705.000|20110109190706.000|CC1|THE SHERIFF YESTERDAY.          
20110109190706.000|20110109190707.000|CC1|HE NOTED IT.                    
20110109190707.000|20110109190708.000|CC1|THEY PUT UP THIS PICTURE OF A   
20110109190708.000|20110109190709.000|CC1|MAN.                            
20110109190709.000|20110109190712.000|CC1|40 TO 50 YEARS OLD, DARK HAIR,  
20110109190712.000|20110109190714.000|CC1|CAUCASIAN, DARK BLUE JEANS, DARK
20110109190714.000|20110109190717.000|CC1|BLUE JACKET.                    
20110109190717.000|20110109190719.000|CC1|THEY HAVE A PICTURE HERE.       
20110109190719.000|20110109190720.000|CC1|THE EXACT INFORMATION IS        
20110109190720.000|20110109190721.000|CC1|UNCLEAR.                        
20110109190721.000|20110109190723.000|CC1|HE WAS IN THE AREA.             
20110109190723.000|20110109190724.000|CC1|HE MAY HAVE BEEN WITH LOUGHNER. 
20110109190724.000|20110109190725.000|CC1|NO MORE INFORMATION ABOUT THAT. 
20110109190725.000|20110109190727.000|CC1|THE AUTHORITIES WANT THAT       
20110109190727.000|20110109190727.000|CC1|PICTURE OUT, HOPING SOMEONE     
20110109190727.000|20110109190728.000|CC1|COULD BRING THEM A LITTLE MORE  
20110109190728.000|20110109190729.000|CC1|INFORMATION.                    
20110109190729.000|20110109190729.000|CC1|THEY'RE NOT DEFINITELY SAYING   
20110109190729.000|20110109190732.000|CC1|THERE WAS A SECOND PERSON       
20110109190732.000|20110109190735.000|CC1|INVOLVED, BUT THEY'RE LEAVE ING 
20110109190735.000|20110109190736.000|CC1|THAT POSSIBILITY OPEN AND THEY  
20110109190736.000|20110109190737.000|CC1|DEFINITELY WANT TO TALK TO THIS 
20110109190737.000|20110109190737.000|CC1|MAN OR FIND OUT MORE ABOUT HIM. 
20110109190737.000|20110109190738.000|CC1|>> LESTER HOLT ON THE SCENE IN  
20110109190738.000|20110109190739.000|CC1|TUCSON, ARIZONA.                
20110109190739.000|20110109190741.000|CC1|LESTER, THANK YOU VERY MUCH.    
20110109190741.000|20110109190743.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THANK YOU, DAVID.  
20110109190743.000|20110109192820.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110109190743.000|20110109190745.000|CC1|>>> NOW FOR MORE REACTION AND   
20110109190745.000|20110109190747.000|CC1|DISCUSSION OF THE BIGGER ISSUES 
20110109190747.000|20110109190749.000|CC1|FROM THIS INCIDENT, I'M JOINED  
20110109190749.000|20110109190752.000|CC1|BY FIVE OF REPRESENTATIVE       
20110109190752.000|20110109190753.000|CC1|GIFFORDS' COLLEAGUES IN THE     
20110109190753.000|20110109190755.000|CC1|HOUSE FROM THE ARIZONA          
20110109190755.000|20110109190756.000|CC1|DELEGATION, THE SECOND DISTRICT,
20110109190756.000|20110109190800.000|CC1|TRENT FRANKS AND PARTS OF       
20110109190800.000|20110109190802.000|CC1|TUCSON, REPRESENTATIVE PAUL     
20110109190802.000|20110109190806.000|CC1|GRIJALVA.                       
20110109190806.000|20110109190808.000|CC1|EMANUEL CLEAVER AND NEWLY       
20110109190808.000|20110109190813.000|CC1|ELECTED RAUL LABRADOR, TEA PARTY
20110109190813.000|20110109190814.000|CC1|BACKED MEMBER FROM IDAHO.       
20110109190814.000|20110109190816.000|CC1|THANK YOU ALL FOR BEING HERE.   
20110109190816.000|20110109190819.000|CC1|I'M JUST SO SORRY THAT IT'S     
20110109190819.000|20110109190820.000|CC1|UNDER THESE CIRCUMSTANCES THAT  
20110109190820.000|20110109190820.000|CC1|WE NEED TO HAVE THIS            
20110109190820.000|20110109190822.000|CC1|CONVERSATION.                   
20110109190822.000|20110109190823.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN, LET ME BEGIN WITH
20110109190823.000|20110109190823.000|CC1|YOU.                            
20110109190823.000|20110109190824.000|CC1|THIS WAS A CLOSE FRIEND AND     
20110109190824.000|20110109190825.000|CC1|COLLEAGUE.                      
20110109190825.000|20110109190825.000|CC1|TELL ME ABOUT YOUR FRIEND.      
20110109190825.000|20110109190828.000|CC1|HOW IS SHE DOING?               
20110109190828.000|20110109190831.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, BY EVERY           
20110109190831.000|20110109190833.000|CC1|INDICATION -- SORRY.            
20110109190833.000|20110109190834.000|CC1|BY EVERY INDICATION, THE FIGHTER
20110109190834.000|20110109190835.000|CC1|THAT GABBY GIFFORDS IS, IS      
20110109190835.000|20110109190839.000|CC1|SHOWING FULL STRENGTH.          
20110109190839.000|20110109190841.000|CC1|SHE'S, FROM WHAT I WAS TOLD BY  
20110109190841.000|20110109190843.000|CC1|HER STAFF LAST NIGHT, WOKE UP,  
20110109190843.000|20110109190844.000|CC1|RESPONDED TO MARK'S -- I THINK  
20110109190844.000|20110109190849.000|CC1|HIS VOICE.                      
20110109190849.000|20110109190852.000|CC1|MOVED ARMS AND LEGS.            
20110109190852.000|20110109190853.000|CC1|>> THIS IS HER HUSBAND WE'RE    
20110109190853.000|20110109190855.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT.                  
20110109190855.000|20110109190856.000|CC1|>> YEAH, HER HUSBAND, MARK.     
20110109190856.000|20110109190856.000|CC1|THEN THEY SEDATED HER AGAIN.    
20110109190856.000|20110109190857.000|CC1|GABBY GIFFORDS, ANYONE THAT     
20110109190857.000|20110109190858.000|CC1|KNOWS HER, HAS EVER MET HER, IS 
20110109190858.000|20110109190859.000|CC1|THE MOST OPEN, WARM AND SWEET   
20110109190859.000|20110109190904.000|CC1|WOMAN.                          
20110109190904.000|20110109190906.000|CC1|SHE'S -- THE BEST WAY TO        
20110109190906.000|20110109190907.000|CC1|DESCRIBE HER IS THAT SHE'S THE  
20110109190907.000|20110109190909.000|CC1|KIND OF PERSON THAT TRIES TO SEE
20110109190909.000|20110109190911.000|CC1|THE GOOD IN EVERYONE, EVEN      
20110109190911.000|20110109190914.000|CC1|WHEN -- EVEN WHEN SHE'S IN THE  
20110109190914.000|20110109190915.000|CC1|MIDST OF THE KIND OF STRIFE THAT
20110109190915.000|20110109190917.000|CC1|IS GOING ON IN SOUTHERN ARIZONA 
20110109190917.000|20110109190920.000|CC1|AND THE IMMIGRATION LAWS AND THE
20110109190920.000|20110109190922.000|CC1|BATTLEGROUND THAT ARIZONA HAS   
20110109190922.000|20110109190923.000|CC1|BEEN, SHE REALLY ALWAYS LOOKS ON
20110109190923.000|20110109190926.000|CC1|THE BRIGHT SIDE.                
20110109190926.000|20110109190927.000|CC1|SHE'S A GLASS IS HALF FULL KIND 
20110109190927.000|20110109190928.000|CC1|OF PERSON.                      
20110109190928.000|20110109190928.000|CC1|>> YOU WORKED WITH HER VERY     
20110109190928.000|20110109190931.000|CC1|CLOSELY IN TUCSON.              
20110109190931.000|20110109190933.000|CC1|I HAD AN OPPORTUNITY TO MEET HER
20110109190933.000|20110109190935.000|CC1|IN TUCSON JUST LAST SPRING AT AN
20110109190935.000|20110109190936.000|CC1|EVENT WHERE I SPOKE AND HAD A

20110109190939.000|20110109190942.000|CC1|CONVERSATION ABOUT THE ISSUES   
20110109190942.000|20110109190943.000|CC1|SHE CARED ABOUT.                
20110109190943.000|20110109190945.000|CC1|TALK ABOUT SOME OF THAT AS WE   
20110109190945.000|20110109190946.000|CC1|LOOK AT SOME OF THE IMAGES OF   
20110109190946.000|20110109190950.000|CC1|HER BEING SWORN IN JUST THIS    
20110109190950.000|20110109190953.000|CC1|WEEK IN FRONT OF THE SPEAKER.   
20110109190953.000|20110109190954.000|CC1|>> FOR ARIZONA, I THINK FOR THIS
20110109190954.000|20110109190955.000|CC1|NATION, AS DEBBIE JUST SAID,    
20110109190955.000|20110109190955.000|CC1|THIS IS A WOMAN WHOSE WHOLE     
20110109190955.000|20110109190956.000|CC1|FUTURE IS IN FRONT OF HER.      
20110109190956.000|20110109190957.000|CC1|A RISING STAR, NOT ONLY IN      
20110109190957.000|20110109190957.000|CC1|POLITICS, BUT IN LEADERSHIP IN  
20110109190957.000|20110109191002.000|CC1|GENERAL.                        
20110109191002.000|20110109191003.000|CC1|AND THIS TRAGEDY HAS LEFT US IN 
20110109191003.000|20110109191009.000|CC1|TUCSON IN SHOCK AND THEN TODAY  
20110109191009.000|20110109191015.000|CC1|NUMB ABOUT THE WHOLE -- GABBY IS
20110109191015.000|20110109191017.000|CC1|A LEADER IN OUR COMMUNITY,      
20110109191017.000|20110109191018.000|CC1|SOMEONE THAT -- AS WAS SAID,    
20110109191018.000|20110109191020.000|CC1|SOMEONE THAT LOOKED AT THINGS IN
20110109191020.000|20110109191024.000|CC1|A VERY POSITIVE -- WHAT WE DO   
20110109191024.000|20110109191026.000|CC1|FOR OUR LIVES IN POLITICS,      
20110109191026.000|20110109191027.000|CC1|SOMETIMES THERE'S GRADING AND   
20110109191027.000|20110109191028.000|CC1|FRICTION THAT'S PART OF IT.     
20110109191028.000|20110109191037.000|CC1|GABBY LOOKED AT POLITICS AS A   
20110109191037.000|20110109191038.000|CC1|MECHANISM TO GET THINGS DONE AND
20110109191038.000|20110109191039.000|CC1|SAW THE GOOD IN THINGS.

20110109191048.000|20110109191049.000|CC1|A MILLION PEOPLE, BUT IS SMALL.

20110109191154.000|20110109191158.000|CC1|AND THE ACCESS TO HER

20110109191159.000|20110109191200.000|CC1|SHE WAS HAVING YESTERDAY WAS    
20110109191200.000|20110109191200.000|CC1|VERY IMPORTANT TO HER.          
20110109191200.000|20110109191201.000|CC1|>> EVERY INTERVIEW I'VE BEEN ON,
20110109191201.000|20110109191202.000|CC1|I HAVE REFERENCED WHAT SHE JUST 
20110109191202.000|20110109191202.000|CC1|DID, BECAUSE IT IS SO IRONIC    
20110109191202.000|20110109191203.000|CC1|THAT WHEN SHE HAD THE           
20110109191203.000|20110109191204.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY TO READ HER PART OF 
20110109191204.000|20110109191204.000|CC1|THE CONSTITUTION, THAT THIS WAS 
20110109191204.000|20110109191205.000|CC1|THE ONE THAT SHE READ.          
20110109191205.000|20110109191206.000|CC1|YET WHEN SHE WAS OUT, EXERCISING
20110109191206.000|20110109191208.000|CC1|THAT RIGHT, WHEN SHE WAS OUT,   
20110109191208.000|20110109191209.000|CC1|DOING HER JOB AS A MEMBER OF    
20110109191209.000|20110109191210.000|CC1|CONGRESS, SOME DERANGED         
20110109191210.000|20110109191211.000|CC1|DEGENERATE SHOT HER DOWN.       
20110109191211.000|20110109191214.000|CC1|I WILL TELL YOU, I THINK THAT'S 
20110109191214.000|20110109191219.000|CC1|AN ATTACK NOT ONLY ON FREEDOM OF
20110109191219.000|20110109191220.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY ITSELF BUT AN ATTACK

20110109191226.000|20110109191228.000|CC1|AS CONSERVATIVE AS I AM AND OF  
20110109191228.000|20110109191230.000|CC1|GABBY GIFFORDS.                 
20110109191230.000|20110109191235.000|CC1|BUT I WILL TELL YOU THAT NEVER  
20110109191235.000|20110109191237.000|CC1|DRKS AT ONE TIME EVEN THE

20110109191242.000|20110109191243.000|CC1|THIS IS A PRECIOUS, DECENT WOMAN
20110109191243.000|20110109191244.000|CC1|THAT DID NOT DESERVE WHAT       
20110109191244.000|20110109191245.000|CC1|HAPPENED TO HER.                
20110109191245.000|20110109191246.000|CC1|AND I HOPE THAT SOMEHOW WE      
20110109191246.000|20110109191248.000|CC1|PURSUE PROSECUTING THIS

20110109191249.000|20110109191251.000|CC1|MONSTER TO THE FULLEST EXTENT OF
20110109191251.000|20110109191252.000|CC1|THE LAW WITH THE GREATEST ENERGY
20110109191252.000|20110109191257.000|CC1|WE POSSIBLY CAN.                
20110109191257.000|20110109191259.000|CC1|>> CONGRESSMAN CLEAVER, I WANT  
20110109191259.000|20110109191300.000|CC1|TO TALK WITH YOU ABOUT THAT     
20110109191300.000|20110109191302.000|CC1|ISSUE.                          
20110109191302.000|20110109191303.000|CC1|IT MATTERED TO HER.             
20110109191303.000|20110109191303.000|CC1|SHE WAS ON TWITTER JUST BEFORE  
20110109191303.000|20110109191304.000|CC1|THIS EVENT.                     
20110109191304.000|20110109191304.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT SHE PUT ON HER     
20110109191304.000|20110109191306.000|CC1|TWITTER FEED, INDICATING SHE    
20110109191306.000|20110109191308.000|CC1|WOULD BE HAVING THIS EVENT,     
20110109191308.000|20110109191308.000|CC1|INVITING PEOPLE, MY FIRST       
20110109191308.000|20110109191309.000|CC1|CONGRESS, ON YOUR CORNER STARTS 
20110109191309.000|20110109191309.000|CC1|NOW.                            
20110109191309.000|20110109191312.000|CC1|PLEASE STOP BY TO LET ME KNOW   
20110109191312.000|20110109191314.000|CC1|WHAT'S ON YOUR MIND OR TWEET ME 
20110109191314.000|20110109191315.000|CC1|LATER.                          
20110109191315.000|20110109191316.000|CC1|THIS IS THE REALITY OF HAVING   
20110109191316.000|20110109191318.000|CC1|ACCESS TO YOUR CONSTITUENTS IN A
20110109191318.000|20110109191319.000|CC1|SHOPPING MALL OUTSIDE OF A      
20110109191319.000|20110109191323.000|CC1|SAFEWAY.                        
20110109191323.000|20110109191324.000|CC1|SHE'S RIGHT THERE.              
20110109191324.000|20110109191326.000|CC1|YOU CAN WALK UP TO HER, HEAR    
20110109191326.000|20110109191328.000|CC1|HER, TALK TO HER, SHAKE HER     
20110109191328.000|20110109191329.000|CC1|HAND, OR DO SOMETHING AS AWFUL  
20110109191329.000|20110109191331.000|CC1|AS THIS.                        
20110109191331.000|20110109191332.000|CC1|>> ALL OF US CONDUCT THOSE TOWN 
20110109191332.000|20110109191333.000|CC1|HALL MEETINGS.                  
20110109191333.000|20110109191334.000|CC1|I'VE DONE ONE EVERY MONTH SINCE 
20110109191334.000|20110109191335.000|CC1|I WAS ELECTED.                  
20110109191335.000|20110109191336.000|CC1|WE CALL IT COFFEE WITH THE      
20110109191336.000|20110109191338.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN.                    
20110109191338.000|20110109191342.000|CC1|AND WE MUST, IN A DEMOCRACY,    
20110109191342.000|20110109191346.000|CC1|HAVE ACCESS TO OUR CONSTITUENTS.
20110109191346.000|20110109191350.000|CC1|AND I THINK WHAT WE ARE SEEING, 
20110109191350.000|20110109191352.000|CC1|THOUGH, IS THE PUBLIC IS BEING  
20110109191352.000|20110109191357.000|CC1|WILD TO THE POINT WHERE THOSE   
20110109191357.000|20110109191358.000|CC1|KINDS OF EVENTS AND             
20110109191358.000|20110109191359.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITIES FOR PEOPLE TO     
20110109191359.000|20110109191400.000|CC1|EXPRESS THEIR OPINIONS TO US ARE
20110109191400.000|20110109191404.000|CC1|BECOMING A LITTLE VOLATILE.     
20110109191404.000|20110109191405.000|CC1|WE HAVE 435 MEMBERS OF CONGRESS.
20110109191405.000|20110109191406.000|CC1|IF YOU RANK THEM IN TERMS OF    
20110109191406.000|20110109191408.000|CC1|VOLATILITY, GABBY IS PROBABLY IN
20110109191408.000|20110109191412.000|CC1|THE LAST ONE-HALF OF 1%.        
20110109191412.000|20110109191412.000|CC1|AND IT JUST SEEMS SO IRONIC THAT
20110109191412.000|20110109191419.000|CC1|SHE WOULD BECOME A VICTIM.      
20110109191419.000|20110109191421.000|CC1|AND SHE IS CLEARLY NOT A HOT    
20110109191421.000|20110109191422.000|CC1|HEAD OR SOMEBODY WHO IS PRONE TO
20110109191422.000|20110109191426.000|CC1|CREATE CONTROVERSY.             
20110109191426.000|20110109191427.000|CC1|>> CONGRESSMAN LABRADOR, THIS IS
20110109191427.000|20110109191429.000|CC1|AN INTRODUCTION, HORRIBLE       
20110109191429.000|20110109191430.000|CC1|INTRODUCTION TO CONGRESS FOR    
20110109191430.000|20110109191433.000|CC1|YOU.                            
20110109191433.000|20110109191435.000|CC1|YOU'RE A BRAND GNU MEMBER,      
20110109191435.000|20110109191438.000|CC1|FRESHMAN MEMBER FROM IDAHO.     
20110109191438.000|20110109191439.000|CC1|YOUR WIFE, YOU WERE TELLING ME  
20110109191439.000|20110109191439.000|CC1|BEFORE WE STARTED, WAS          
20110109191439.000|20110109191440.000|CC1|PARTICULARLY SHAKEN BY THIS.    
20110109191440.000|20110109191441.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS.                     
20110109191441.000|20110109191441.000|CC1|AND, YOU KNOW, FIRST OF ALL, MY 
20110109191441.000|20110109191442.000|CC1|CONDOLENCES TO THE FAMILIES.    
20110109191442.000|20110109191448.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN A TERRIBLE WEEK.      
20110109191448.000|20110109191450.000|CC1|AND IT'S A TERRIBLE WAY TO END  
20110109191450.000|20110109191452.000|CC1|THE WEEK.                       
20110109191452.000|20110109191453.000|CC1|ALL I'VE HEARD ABOUT GABBY --   
20110109191453.000|20110109191454.000|CC1|AND I DON'T KNOW HER.           
20110109191454.000|20110109191455.000|CC1|I'M THE ONLY PERSON ON THIS     
20110109191455.000|20110109191456.000|CC1|PANEL THAT DOESN'T KNOW HER.    
20110109191456.000|20110109191456.000|CC1|I'VE HEARD BOTH FROM REPUBLICANS
20110109191456.000|20110109191457.000|CC1|AND DEMOCRATS WHAT A WONDERFUL  
20110109191457.000|20110109191458.000|CC1|WOMAN SHE IS AND WHAT GREAT     
20110109191458.000|20110109191459.000|CC1|SERVICE SHE WAS GIVING TO HER   
20110109191459.000|20110109191503.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS.                   
20110109191503.000|20110109191504.000|CC1|I JUST WANT TO MAKE SURE THAT WE
20110109191504.000|20110109191505.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND THAT SHE WAS DOING   
20110109191505.000|20110109191507.000|CC1|WHAT SHE WAS SUPPOSED TO BE     
20110109191507.000|20110109191509.000|CC1|DOING AND SHE WAS DOING EXACTLY 
20110109191509.000|20110109191512.000|CC1|WHAT ALL OF US SHOULD BE DOING, 
20110109191512.000|20110109191514.000|CC1|WHICH IS TALKING TO OUR         
20110109191514.000|20110109191516.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS AND TRYING TO GET  
20110109191516.000|20110109191519.000|CC1|EDUCATED ON THE ISSUES.         
20110109191519.000|20110109191520.000|CC1|AND I JUST HOPE WE CAN HAVE SOME
20110109191520.000|20110109191520.000|CC1|CIVILITY AND WE CAN MOVE        
20110109191520.000|20110109191521.000|CC1|FORWARD.                        
20110109191521.000|20110109191521.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE REAL SECURITY      
20110109191521.000|20110109191522.000|CC1|QUESTIONS THAT HAVE TO BE RAISED
20110109191522.000|20110109191523.000|CC1|AS A RESULT OF ALL OF THIS,     
20110109191523.000|20110109191524.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN.                  
20110109191524.000|20110109191525.000|CC1|MAXINE WATERS TELLING POLITICO  
20110109191525.000|20110109191530.000|CC1|THIS MORNING THAT SHE HAS HER   
20110109191530.000|20110109191531.000|CC1|OWN FEARS ABOUT SECURITY FOR    
20110109191531.000|20110109191531.000|CC1|MEMBERS.                        
20110109191531.000|20110109191532.000|CC1|THIS IS WHAT SHE SAID.          
20110109191532.000|20110109191536.000|CC1|WE CAN BE SHOT DOWN IN OUR      
20110109191536.000|20110109191539.000|CC1|DISTRICT, BUT WE CAN ALSOBE SHOT
20110109191539.000|20110109191541.000|CC1|WALKING OVER TO THE CAPITOL.    
20110109191541.000|20110109191542.000|CC1|WE HAVE A LOT OF PEOPLE OUTSIDE 
20110109191542.000|20110109191542.000|CC1|WHO APPEAR TO BE FRAGILE        
20110109191542.000|20110109191543.000|CC1|EMOTIONALLY.                    
20110109191543.000|20110109191544.000|CC1|WE DON'T KNOW WHEN ONE WILL WALK
20110109191544.000|20110109191544.000|CC1|UP AND SHOOT US DOWN.           
20110109191544.000|20110109191545.000|CC1|WE ARE VULNERABLE AND THERE'S NO
20110109191545.000|20110109191546.000|CC1|REAL WAY TO PROTECT US.         
20110109191546.000|20110109191546.000|CC1|IS THIS A WAKE-UP CALL IN TERMS 
20110109191546.000|20110109191547.000|CC1|OF THINKING ABOUT SECURITY FOR  
20110109191547.000|20110109191548.000|CC1|THESE KINDS OF EVENTS?          
20110109191548.000|20110109191552.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT NEEDS TO BE A     
20110109191552.000|20110109191555.000|CC1|WAKE-UP CALL FOR MEMBERS WHO    
20110109191555.000|20110109191558.000|CC1|HAVE TREATED SECURITY IN A      
20110109191558.000|20110109191601.000|CC1|CAVALIER -- THEIR OWN SECURITY  
20110109191601.000|20110109191606.000|CC1|IN A CAVALIER WAY.              
20110109191606.000|20110109191606.000|CC1|I KNOW WHEN I HAD TOWN HALL     
20110109191606.000|20110109191607.000|CC1|MEETINGS, WHICH I HAD REGULARLY,
20110109191607.000|20110109191608.000|CC1|AND VERY OPEN PUBLIC MEETINGS,  
20110109191608.000|20110109191608.000|CC1|THERE ARE ALWAYS OFFICERS       
20110109191608.000|20110109191611.000|CC1|PRESENT.                        
20110109191611.000|20110109191613.000|CC1|NOT A CAVALRY OF OFFICERS BUT AT
20110109191613.000|20110109191616.000|CC1|LEAST A SHOW OF LAW ENFORCEMENT 
20110109191616.000|20110109191618.000|CC1|SO THAT WE CAN MAKE SURE THAT MY
20110109191618.000|20110109191621.000|CC1|STAFF IS PROTECTED.             
20110109191621.000|20110109191622.000|CC1|BECAUSE, REMEMBER, AS WE SAW    
20110109191622.000|20110109191622.000|CC1|WITH MR. ZIMMERMAN'S DEATH, IT'S
20110109191622.000|20110109191623.000|CC1|NOT JUST OUR PERSONAL SAFETY    
20110109191623.000|20110109191623.000|CC1|THAT MATTERS.

20110109191624.000|20110109191630.000|CC1|OUR CONSTITUENTS.

20110109191633.000|20110109191635.000|CC1|WE NEED TO STRIKE A BALANCE.    
20110109191635.000|20110109191641.000|CC1|>> YOU TALK ABOUT THAT.

20110109191648.000|20110109191649.000|CC1|MEMBER OF THE BENCH, JUST 63    
20110109191649.000|20110109191650.000|CC1|YEARS OLD.

20110109191652.000|20110109191653.000|CC1|BE GOOD FRIENDS WITH THE

20110109192302.000|20110109192303.000|CC1|USING AGAINST PRESIDENT OBAMA.  
20110109192303.000|20110109192306.000|CC1|IT'S NOT SOMETHING THAT EITHER

20110109193505.000|20110109193506.000|CC1|THIS DIVISIVE WHEN THOSE ARE THE
20110109193506.000|20110109193509.000|CC1|ISSUES AT STAKE?                
20110109193509.000|20110109193511.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THUNK YOU HAVE TO    
20110109193511.000|20110109193512.000|CC1|CONTINUE WITH THE DEBATE.       
20110109193512.000|20110109193514.000|CC1|I THINK IT'S THE WAY YOU PRESENT
20110109193514.000|20110109193516.000|CC1|THE DEBATE.                     
20110109193516.000|20110109193517.000|CC1|IT'S THE WORDS YOU USE, SOME OF 
20110109193517.000|20110109193517.000|CC1|THE RHETORIC YOU USE.

20110109193518.000|20110109193519.000|CC1|STIFLE ONE SIDE OR THE OTHER.
